page.title: 01Home Life
page.content: In Swanley 324 people,out of 352 asked,were married. 260 had children. There was a total of 156 boys in the families and 309 girls. Out of these, 56 were under 5 yrs,21 were between 5-11 yrs, 145 were between 11-18 and 48 were over 18. Out of the husbands 41 were born locally and out of the wives 99 were born locally. 93 have lived in their homes for less than 5 yrs,59 have lived in their homes for between 5-11 yrs,172 more than 10 yrs. 35 spend their leisure time in the cinema, 44 spend it in the theatre, 102 do sports,79 in the pub,31 dancing and 180 do other things. 224 have hobbies. 263 have outdoor hobbies,61 have indoor hobbies.
